title: Mobile Device-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics knowledge and fundamental smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: Focuses on helping current practitioners solve workplace mathematics problems using mobile technology. Key activities include collaboration and resource sharing via smartphone apps

learning_goals: Learners can convert real-life math problems into structured project tasks using mobile apps
Learners can derive solutions by exchanging real-time feedback with peers via smartphone-based collaboration tools
Learners can apply at least three data visualization techniques (graphs, charts, etc.) using mobile learning tools

resources: Real-time collaboration tools (Google Docs/Slack mobile version)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
